description: Summer Vacation House - available June 27-August 15 ($2,600/week - Sat. change over day).
Discount rates before and after those dates.

Not be missed - ideal location in Narragansett, RI.   New Kitchen with computer on fridge, remodeled baths on main level, Great Room, outdoor shower, furnished deck.  5 Bedrooms (3-2nd floor, 2-1st floor).
This very spacious house is within a short drive of four (4) beautiful Rhode Island Beaches:
•	Scarborough State Beach - popular and well known - 2 miles east
•	Salty Brine (Galilee) State Beach - white sandy beach - 4 miles south
•	Roger Wheeler's (Sand Hill /Cove) State Beach -  a family beach - 4 miles south
•	Narragansett Town Beach - classic New England saltwater coastal beach - 4 miles north

Enjoy the sounds of the surf, the clean sand, looking for sea glass, jumping the waves and the nearby snack shacks.  Beach items are provided at the house for your use (cart, beach chairs, sand mat, umbrella, and cooler).  Just pack up and go, so you have more time to enjoy the beach of your choice.

Don’t forget the other area amenities; kayaking, paddle-boarding, fishing, golf, trail walking, bicycling, etc. Dining options are numerous, our favorite area is Boon Street.  We recommend pizza form the Bike Stop Cafe and Crazy Burger for a veggie experience.  For seafood try the Coast Guard House or Matunuck Oyster Bar. Newport, RI is less than 20 miles away with its famous Cliff Walk and eclectic shops. Don’t forget a trip on the Block Island Ferry out of Point Judith, less than a 5 minute drive. This is the ideal location!

After returning to the house from your day-long adventure, get the sand off in the enclosed outdoor shower (hot/cold water) behind the house. Relax on the outdoor deck in comfy lounge furniture and feel the ocean breeze.  Enjoy outdoor grilling and eating at the outdoor table/ chairs.  Take a short walk to the Point Judith Pond waterfront and watch the sunset.  Nice neighborhood, quiet, private.
Just bring (or locally rent) the towels and linens, everything else is here for you. Your completely furnished home has central AC when needed, or try the open windows and ceiling fans.

The stone driveway allows ample parking for 5+ vehicles with side entry to newly renovated kitchen.  Enjoy the kitchen’s new high-end appliances; including a refrigerator with a touch screen computer, wine cooler, breakfast bar seating and adjacent dining area. The house front entry opens to the Great Room (2-1/2 story) with a full height stone wall and large screen TV at its base.  Ample lounge seating is flanked by a bar set-up next to open living room.

Game night can be held at the large dining room table.  With seating for 10+ it is perfect for large group gatherings, with easy access to the kitchen and breakfast bar outfitted with 5 bar chairs.  Easy internet sign-in access .
Two bedrooms/two bathrooms and laundry room occupy additional space on the first floor:

•	A large combo bedroom/living room is accessed through a barn-door slider off the dining room. The queen bed, single sleeper pullout/sofa and queen-ann chairs provide comfort.  The combo room has a 2nd large screen tv, providing a relaxing space in the evening or on a rainy day.  The room can be closed off for privacy.  The combo room has a wall-of-windows on 2-sides with a slider door to the upper deck on a 3rd side.

•	An accordion door at the side of the combo room leads to a full bath (shower), which can be closed off from the washer/dryer (large capacity).  The room is newly remodeled with windows that overlook the back yard and undeveloped property.
•	The first floor master bedroom (queen) has access to the en-suite bath/shower, and large walk-in closet.  The two 2 full length windows and white wicker furniture keep the room bright and cherry.
•	The bath/shower also has a second access door to the main dining area on the first floor.
An open stairway leads to three (3) private bedrooms on the 2nd floor and a hallway accessible full bath with tub/shower:
•	Master bedroom (queen) on 2nd floor with large open floor area, one full length window and one half window over seating bench.
•	Newly remodeled loft bedroom (queen) with high ceiling, wide closet and lots of natural light.
•	Freshly painted yellow bedroom (double) with vintage dresser, full closet and full length window.

Comfortable bedding with protective covers, comforters and fluffy pillows.  Linens (sheet sets/pillowcases & towels) are the responsibility of the renter; linens can be 'rented' locally for the week (e.g. www.vacationhouselinens.com).  Bedding allows for 11 persons total.

title: SE RI Beaches: Pt. Judith Home
description: Exclusive Opportunity to rent in a Seaside Community. Life with Clean Air and the Ocean at your feet! Wonderful Point Judith Narraganset, RI location

Renovated beach home with eat-in kitchen, bath, family/living room, master bed, 2 office or guest rooms (3+). Appliances including gas stove, microwave with vent, disposal, refrigerator with ice-maker, and washer and dryer, set up for Verizon Fios or Cox Network.  New natural gas heat and hot water. Plenty of extra heated storage with sink and toilet in utility room. Outdoor beach shower and large back yard for entertaining. Herb / vegetable garden, grapes, berries, mint, apple tree. Large private yard with back yard deck. Off-street parking for 2 cars.
Any season is the place to be by the sea. This is a charming comfortable home.
Currently fully furnished with all amenities. Ready for your Stay and Enjoyment.
$1500/month for September - May, or $1850 annual including summer months. Call for Specifics/ Flex dates.
***Call to reserve*** Weekly, Daily, or for your special summer vacation. Yes, summer rental bookings now.
Just a walk to the sea anytime of the year.
This must me the place for you!!
Dan Z.

title: 20/21 STUDENT RENTAL FULLY FURNISHED
description: STUDENT RENTAL HEAT AND ELECTRIC INCLUDED!
Sandcastles 2-bed, 1-bath rental home in Narragansett. Nestled just a 5-minute walk to the shore.
Relax out on the deck for a barbecue, try some seafood at Port Judith, and walk along the sandy shore at sunset - all from this coastal Rhode Island home!

Breathe in the coastal air as you approach this charming Narragansett home-away-from-home! Towering trees create a natural barrier around this Rhode Island haven, so you’ll enjoy plenty of privacy on your quiet coastal home.
THE LOCATION

5 minutes to Black Point Beach. Along with stunning rock formations, sandy beaches, and stunning sunsets, you’ll find a short trail through the woods that leads to a picturesque lookout point - perfect for picnics!

From Black Point, take one of the walking trails over to Scarborough Beach! There’s so much to do on these beaches, including taking pictures in front of the huge granite boulders, sinking into the tide pools, or simply relaxing back with a gripping read.

A quick bike ride down Ocean Road, back dropped by both views of the ocean and several celebrity-owned mansions, leads all the way to Port Judith! Here, you’ll find the best seafood in America at Chair 5, Iggy’s Doughboys, or George’s of Galilee.

title: JAN '20 URI HOUSING  - NARRAGANSETT, GREAT ISLAND
description: AVAILABLE JAN - MAY '20....CLEAN and BRIGHT, well furnished 3 bedroom, 1 bath house accommodates three tenants with full unfinished walk-out basement in the quaint beach island community of Great Island.  Great Island is in the heart of Narragansett, where you're 15 minutes from both the URI Main Campus and URI's Bay Campus and even closer to the Block Island Ferry, South County's best seafood restaurants, state beaches, deep sea fishing charters and public boat ramp. Take advantage of the salt pond with sailing, boating, swimming or just relaxing along the shore.

Not all summer cottages are built for year-round living like this one.  Don't just settle for a "drafty" beach cottage when you can have a year-round home in the best location in South County....on Great Island! This is a well insulated home....including the walls, ceilings and yes, even the floors. And always look for  windows that are weather-tight as well. And when it comes to cable...we'll save you money here as well....our home is already wired for your choice of Cox or Verizon Fios....no need to pay the high installation fees.... just call and have it turned on.
This is a smoke and pet free home.
Features Include

Well insulated cottage includes 3 bedrooms (1 queen, 2 twins, 1 twin), or bring your own beds, 1 Full Bath, Full Walk-Out Basement, Central Air, Ceiling Fans, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Slider to Deck, Family Room, Cable Ready for Cox or Fios, Pots/Pans/Glasses/Utensils/Dishes, Stove/Oven, Tile and Carpeting, Chaise Lounges, Washer/Dryer, Yard, Off Street Driveway Parking, Outdoor Shower, Gas Heat

title: 20/21 ACADEMIC YEAR STUDENT RENTAL FULLY FURNISHED
description: STUDENT RENTAL HEAT AND ELECTRIC INCLUDED!
Sandcastles 2-bed, 1-bath rental home in Narragansett. Nestled just a 5-minute walk to the shore.
Relax out on the deck for a barbecue, try some seafood at Port Judith, and walk along the sandy shore at sunset - all from this coastal Rhode Island home!

Breathe in the coastal air as you approach this charming Narragansett home-away-from-home! Towering trees create a natural barrier around this Rhode Island haven, so you’ll enjoy plenty of privacy on your quiet coastal home.
THE LOCATION

5 minutes to Black Point Beach. Along with stunning rock formations, sandy beaches, and stunning sunsets, you’ll find a short trail through the woods that leads to a picturesque lookout point - perfect for picnics!

From Black Point, take one of the walking trails over to Scarborough Beach! There’s so much to do on these beaches, including taking pictures in front of the huge granite boulders, sinking into the tide pools, or simply relaxing back with a gripping read.

A quick bike ride down Ocean Road, back dropped by both views of the ocean and several celebrity-owned mansions, leads all the way to Port Judith! Here, you’ll find the best seafood in America at Chair 5, Iggy’s Doughboys, or George’s of Galilee.

title: JAN '20 URI HOUSING  - NARRAGANSETT, GREAT ISLAND
description: AVAILABLE JAN - MAY '20....CLEAN and BRIGHT, well furnished 3 bedroom, 1 bath house accommodates three tenants with full unfinished walk-out basement in the quaint beach island community of Great Island.  Great Island is in the heart of Narragansett, where you're 15 minutes from both the URI Main Campus and URI's Bay Campus and even closer to the Block Island Ferry, South County's best seafood restaurants, state beaches, deep sea fishing charters and public boat ramp. Take advantage of the salt pond with sailing, boating, swimming or just relaxing along the shore.

Not all summer cottages are built for year-round living like this one.  Don't just settle for a "drafty" beach cottage when you can have a year-round home in the best location in South County....on Great Island! This is a well insulated home....including the walls, ceilings and yes, even the floors. And always look for  windows that are weather-tight as well. And when it comes to cable...we'll save you money here as well....our home is already wired for your choice of Cox or Verizon Fios....no need to pay the high installation fees.... just call and have it turned on.
This is a smoke and pet free home.
Features Include

Well insulated cottage includes 3 bedrooms (1 queen, 2 twins, 1 twin), or bring your own beds, 1 Full Bath, Full Walk-Out Basement, Central Air, Ceiling Fans, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Slider to Deck, Family Room, Cable Ready for Cox or Fios, Pots/Pans/Glasses/Utensils/Dishes, Stove/Oven, Tile and Carpeting, Chaise Lounges, Washer/Dryer, Yard, Off Street Driveway Parking, Outdoor Shower, Gas Heat
